participant_1.name: Alex Turner
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Alex enjoys discussing finance and entrepreneurship.
participant_1.background: i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers.

participant_2.name: Linda Johnson
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, Linda loves sharing stories about books and travel.
participant_2.background: i'm a librarian. i am 60 years old. i've visited spain a times. i think i'll retire in a few years.
